    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Initialises instance variable fields[][]. Creates an empty board and then fills it with random balls with 8 balls of every one of the six colors. Sets the center field to be empty.

    • Method Detail

      • hasSameNeighbours

        public boolean hasSameNeighbours​(int row,
                                 int col)
        Checks if the field has a neighbour with a ball of the same colour and if the field exists.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the board
        col - the column of the board
        Returns:
        false if the ball in the field has a neighbour with the same colour, true otherwise

        Checks if the board is filled with 8 colours of every type of ball.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the board is ready to be used, false otherwise

        Returns:

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int index)
        Checks if the field is valid through the index.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the field of the board.
        Returns:
        true if index >= 0 && index < DIM * DIM.

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int row,
                       int col)
        Checks if the field is valid through the row and the column.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the board.
        col - the column of the board.
        Returns:
        true if row >= 0 && row <= DIM && col >= 0 && col <= DIM.

        public Field getField​(int i)

      • getField

        public Field getField​(int row,
                      int col)
        Returns the value of the field with row = row and column = col or null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the board.
        col - the column of the board.
        Returns:
        the field with row == row && column == col or null if there is no such field.

        Checks if the field has a ball in it by looking at the field index.
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the field.
        Returns:
        true if ball == null || false if ball != null.

        Parameters:

        col - the column of the board.
        Returns:
        true if ball == null, false if ball != null.
